Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Traded from San Diego to Texas on 2/17/1989 (Going to SD: P Greg A. Harris, LF Randy Ready. Going to TEX: 1B Kevin Maas)...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1990, off Mark Gubicza (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1990, off Andy Hawkins (NYY)...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
